Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Joe Biden greeted Florida voters with "Hello, Minnesota!" The event actually took place in Minnesota, not Florida.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Joe Biden greeted Florida voters with "Hello, Minnesota!" when he did not greet Florida voters at all.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misrepresenting the location of the event and attributing it to Florida instead of Minnesota.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as it is contradicted by photographs, videos, and other evidence that confirm the event took place in Minnesota, not Florida.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Joe Biden greeted Florida voters with "Hello, Minnesota!" without any factual basis.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation needed as the claim is clearly false.
